title: EIP-7549: Move committee index outside Attestation
description: Moves the committee index outside of attestations to improve consensus layer efficiency.
author: dapplion
laymanDescription: Simplifies the structure of validator attestations by moving the committee index field outside the signed message, making verification and aggregation cheaper.

scaleL1.description: Reduces consensus layer overhead for attestation validation and aggregation, improving performance and paving the way for higher throughput.

toolingInfra.description: Consensus monitoring tools have to update parsing of attestations.

layer2s.description: No direct change on L2s unless they rely on attestation data.

stakersNodes.description: Lower resource usage for attestation handling and aggregation, less data to process.

clClients.description: Implementation changes to attestation structures and verification.

benefits: More efficient consensus verification and aggregation
Improves performance for consensus nodes processing lot of signatures
